Company: University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
Description of incident: Hacker(s) gained access              to a UCLA database containing personal information on current and              former students, current and former faculty and staff, parents of              financial aid applicants, and student applicants, including those              who did not attend. Exposed records contained names, SSNs, birth dates,              home addresses, and contact information. About 3,200 of those notified              are current or former staff and faculty of UC Merced and current and              former staff of UC's Oakland headquarters.
